questions.question: Which sentence uses the correct article?
options: All Might is an strongest hero.
All Might is the strongest hero.
All Might is a strongest hero.
questions.answer: All Might is the strongest hero.

questions.question: Which sentence is correctly written?
options: Deku doesn't wants to be a hero.
Deku don't want to be a hero.
Deku doesn't want to be a hero.
Deku not want to be a hero.
questions.answer: Deku doesn't want to be a hero.

questions.question: What is the meaning of 'hero'?
options: A person who runs away from danger.
